item.title: GW4 PhD Studentship
item.description: A PhD studentship is available in the lab (commencing in October 2020). This studentship consists of full UK/EU tuition fees, as well as a Doctoral Stipend matching UK Research Council National Minimum (Â£15,009 p.a. for 2019-20, updated yearly). We welcome applicants with non-biomedical backgrounds and the studentship can fund additional training to assist discipline conversion. Most studentships will be 3.5 years full time or up to 7 years part-time, and can be longer where additional training is undertaken.
